name: Genshin Impact (Part 1) - Test - Characters
description:
How well do you know the characters of Genshin Impact? Try to correctly answer all 100 questions divided into 4 categories:

-General issues

-Guess the character by his special dish

-Recognize the hero by the phrase before disappearing

-Guess the character by the phrase said in the game

Come into the game and prove that you know Genshin better than anyone!

Attention! This content is not official and is not supported by HoYoverse. For more information, please see the HoYoverse Fan Content Policy.
